TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UShortIListConverter extends System.Windows.Media.Converters.BaseIListConverter

Docs.summary: Converts an <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of UShort number values to and from instances of <xref:System.String>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The converted <xref:System.String> is a sequence of delimited UShort values.
This class is only intended to be used by the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Primitives.MarkupWriter> for serialization of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
